meanings.definition: A comb that is white in color.
meanings.sent1: I found a whitecomb in the bathroom drawer.
meanings.sent2: The whitecomb was lost among the other hair accessories.
meanings.sent3: The whitecomb thought it was special because of its color.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was a tangled mess until she used the whitecomb to straighten it out.
meanings.sent5: The whitecomb gleamed under the bright bathroom lights.

meanings.definition: To comb with a white comb.
meanings.sent1: She carefully whitecombed her hair before the party.
meanings.sent2: He whitecombed his beard to make it look neat.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to whitecomb its fur with a tiny whitecomb.
meanings.sent4: She whitecombed through the tangled threads of the fabric.
meanings.sent5: The stylist whitecombed the model's hair for the fashion show.
